name: English To Hebrew Keyboard
short_description:
This adds a hebrew keyboard variation to write hebrew easily by translating latin letters to their hebrew equivalent. 

Exs: 
אני -> 'alef nun yod' -> a n i
אתה -> 'alef tav heh' -> a, shift+t, h
שלום -> 'shin lamed vav memsofit' -> c l o shift+m
להתראות -> 'lamed heh tav resh alef vav tav' -> l h shift+t r a o shift+t

Mapping:
alef -> a
bet -> b
gimel -> g
dalet -> d
heh -> h
vav -> u/o
zayin -> z
het -> shift+h
tet -> t
yod -> i
kaf -> k
kafsofit -> shift+k
lamed -> l
mem -> m
memsofit -> shift+m
nun -> n
nunsofit -> shift+n
sameh -> s
ayin -> e
peh -> p
feh -> f
tzadik -> x
tzadiksofit -> shift+x
quf -> q
resh -> r
shin/sin -> c
tav -> shift+t

Other:
double vav -> w
double yod -> y


You can also write english letters without switching keyboards by enabling CAPS_LOCK.
summary: Write Hebrew with an English Keyboard

audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: End Users/Desktop
